pkgmetadata.longdescription: Robust Inference for Covariate Adjustment in Randomized Clinical Trials // Performs robust estimation and inference when using covariate adjustment and/or covariate-adaptive randomization in randomized clinical trials. Ting Ye, Jun Shao, Yanyao Yi, Qinyuan Zhao (2023) doi:10.1080/01621459.2022.2049278. Ting Ye, Marlena Bannick, Yanyao Yi, Jun Shao (2023) doi:10.1080/24754269.2023.2205802. Ting Ye, Jun Shao, Yanyao Yi (2023) doi:10.1093/biomet/asad045. Marlena Bannick, Jun Shao, Jingyi Liu, Yu Du, Yanyao Yi, Ting Ye (2024) doi:10.1093/biomet/asaf029. Xiaoyu Qiu, Yuhan Qian, Jaehwan Yi, Jinqiu Wang, Yu Du, Yanyao Yi, Ting Ye (2025) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2408.12541.
